title: Person of Interest: Reese VS The Brotherhood
author: POI Fights
comment: John Reese was always the Machines supreme combat asset. He was the archangel of the Machines army.

And so Reese once again gains access to God Mode for a little while. My favorite time of him using it is in Return 0 though when the Machine guides him in battle in God Mode during their last battle. The Machine and John Reese fighting side by side one last time.

I love that moment when the Machine saves him!!! Bad guys are all confused and Reese is like "OH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Okay." God Mode Activate!!! Its funny: the Brotherhood caused so much problems and all it took was this to take them down!!!
Loved it when fusco shows his badge and says " Det.Fusco , you're under arrest , Jackass !!!" ❣
Best scene of the ENTIRE show!
description: Fight Scene from E22 S04: YHWH
